short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamically adds the preferred names for students on the Classter attendance and class lists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a student's preferred name on the Classter Attendance system and Class overview. This extension will cross off any student's registered name and add their preferred one directly to the page. This makes it easier to address students correctly and foster a more inclusive classroom environment.
